rComments: Solid lecturer. He related class materials to current events which is nice. Sometimes he shows fun videos to break the monotony. Tests are difficult, but the class is curved pretty generously.

The lectures are interesting, class is hard but do well on the homework and attend section every week and that should keep your grade up even if you fail all the tests like the majority of the class does. Study the models for the tests, it will save your grade.

I took macro my first quarter at UCSC, and having Hutchison was a bit jarring for me. Without a doubt, he knows economics well, but he was not a good lecturer. I struggled to understand the material (and stay awake). His tests were pretty tough for most people. Buy a physical copy of the book and make it your best friend if you want to survive.

I see a lot of people complaining about this guy. Just don't take 130 unless you are really interested in banking/monetary economics because this is a BORING SUBJECT FOR MOST PPL. He really knows his stuff, and its not his fault ppl don't understand banking/money (again, most ppl dont). Not very approachable @ 1st, but dont let that stop you.

worst teacher ever! he is the most boring teacher ever! students go to his class and sleep. his teaching is boring as hell and his test is confusing! students are having a hard time in his class. don't take this class cause he doesn't curve at all

Professor Hutchison is a very smart dude, however his lectures are absolutely terrible. Sometimes he presents with powerpoints, which we never see, or nothing at all. I haven't missed a single lecture, but still needed to memorize the book. Don't take his classes unless you absolutely love reading textbooks.

Not a terrible class, but reading the book is essential.  Tests are pretty ridiculous. As far as his lecturing goes, he's not that bad, but he's too political.  He tries to sneak in his own opinions about the subject at any point he can, and I personally would rather learn about the stuff on the test--the subject itself--than how he feels about it.

The person who rated this professor on october rated him too early in the quarter which is obviously not accurate... His tests are ridiculous because you don't know what to study and the book is just really dry in material. His TA's just sucks so bad because they even hate him. You can tell he likes teaching Econ though,but not related to his tests

He doesn't know how to teach but he knows his info. After my first midterm (that many failed), he tried to change his way of lecturing but it was just worse! I would recommend you to take his class. GO TO SECTION though. I learned A LOT more there than I did in a lecture. He's so boring too...

Professor Hutchison is a nice man who does not know how to lecture. He is extremely boring and just talks at the class. He rambles in class and really needs to have a more organized teaching structure. Read the book!! It will save your life. Also, go to section. He is a very knowledgeable professor, but cannot relay the information well at all.

He's a good enough teacher. Lectures can be boring, but luckily he puts his powerpoints online. As long as you read the book and read his notes online you should be ok. Tests are hard though. I wouldn't take this class unless you're an econ major

I really enjoyed this class and learned a lot from it.  He was a little disorganized initially, which may be expected for a topics course, but I found it well worth my time since I was interested in the topic.  I put in a good amount of work and got an A.

nice guy but not a very good professor. Tests are too hard and nobody passes bringing the curve down, therefore you pass the class witout learning much. Thought I was failing, but wasnt in the end. Not worth the stress. Dont take intro to macro with him if you arent and econ major.

His classes can get boring, but his current events and the way he connects our reading to his course material really helps.  You really have to pay attention and read A LOT out of the textbook.(The textbook is your bible)  Go to any of his or his TA's office hours as much as possible.

The most boring lectures ever!!!! People would fall asleep and leave during the break. Teaches straight from the book and doesn't give other examples. Tests were hard, especially the final which I failed and due to that got a D in the class even though I did average on the midterm and good on the 4 papers. Don't take a class with him. He's awful!!
Very Clear in Lecture, If you pay attention in class, you will pass.
